entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
